google.author: Anthony G.
google.review: Excellent lil sub shop! The guy thats been taking my orders there is awesome would love to see this place get more noticed! I would recommend 7subs to anyone! Chebroni sub is one of my favorites simply amazing

yelp.author: Erin B.
yelp.review: Great place for a quick and simple sandwich. Friendly and speedy service, prices very reasonable.

tripadvisor.author: Jerome W.
tripadvisor.review: Culinary Coup. Excellent grasp of which ingredients in combination excite the taste buds. Tuna with sprouts highly recommended.
